thread.title: Centrica aims to raise gas output from UK North Morecambe field
thread.title_full: Centrica aims to raise gas output from UK North Morecambe field

title: Centrica aims to raise gas output from UK North Morecambe field
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sat, Jul 18, 2015, 08:14 BST - UK Markets closed Centrica aims to raise gas output from UK North Morecambe field Reuters - UK Focus – 19 hours ago 0.00 
(Updates with details, background) 
LONDON, July 17 (Reuters) - Centrica (LSE: CNA.L - news ) will this month start work on unlocking new reserves in its North Morecambe gas field which could increase output by up to 8.8 billion cubic feet of gas, the British utility said in a statement on Friday. 
The work is likely to run until the end of September, after which output from the field would be gradually increased, a spokesman for Centrica said. 
"In terms of daily production, the impact is likely to be quite minimal as the extra capacity will be released over the entire life of the field," he said. 
Centrica currently produces around 8.4 million cubic meters a day from the field. (Reporting by Susanna Twidale; Editing by David Clarke and Mark Potter) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Infinis shares boosted as renewables group nabs Centrica executive - Sharecast Neil Woodford Buys NewRiver Retail Limited And More Centrica PLC, Imperial Tobacco Group PLC, NEXT plc & Homeserve plc - Fool.co.uk Follow the quotes you care about most.
